item.title: How to edit the starter
item.dc:creator: @1_0wn3d_U_I 1 0wn3d U I
item.description:
@1_0wn3d_U_I wrote:

Open up Client.java and serach for ::starter and you should see:

You should see something like

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {	
            if (starter == 0) {
                addItem(995, 25000000);
                addItem(392, 1500);
                addItem(6528, 1);
                addItem(554, 20000);
                addItem(555, 20000);
                addItem(565, 20000);
                addItem(556, 20000);
                addItem(557, 20000);
                addItem(560, 20000);
                addItem(561, 20000);
                addItem(562, 20000);
                addItem(563, 20000);
                addItem(566, 20000);
                addItem(558, 20000);

This is the default All-Star Scape starter package
It add 20k of each rune 1 obby maul 25m gp abd 1.5 manta rays just edit the item code and the amount to change it =]

Read full topic
